projects.name: Neural Networks and ML Algorithms from scratch
projects.description: Designed Convolutional & Fully Connected neural networks (CNN+FCNN) from scratch in Python. Implemented Forward/Backpropagation, NN layers, Pooling/Flatten layers along with loss function. Ensured reasonable efficiency using vectorization of functions and matrix algebraic formulation of algorithms. Coded various Regression algorithms, Perceptron, Kernels and K-means Clustering in Numpy.

projects.name: Difference-Based Image Noise Modelling
projects.description: Modelled pixel intensity differences in natural images as a parameterized Skellam Distribution. Proved superiority of this model over additive Gaussian noise models using Chi-square goodness of fit. Implemented the algorithm to several practical applications such as edge detection and foreground extraction.

projects.name: Compiler for C-like Language
projects.description: Developed a compiler and evaluator for a subset of C, supporting functions, scope levels and control sequences. Used Lex for tokenizing, Yacc for parsing and constructed AST to generate MIPS assembly code.

projects.name: UMAP based Dimensionality Reduction for Time Series Data
projects.description: Collaborated with co-authors to analyze results and combine experimental findings with literature insights to identify trends in reduced feature sets. Reduced dimensionality by 50% using PCA, Chi-Square, Pearson, and Spearman on UCI-HAR, KU-HAR, HAR, MIT-BIH, and PTB ECG datasets, achieved better results even than PCA in some cases.

experiences.description: Developed an automated end-to-end data validation engine pipeline for Global Supply Chain data, enabling layman language prompts for data validation, and created an interactive dashboard to view the exception log according to the rules/prompts written. Leveraged Mini-LLM-v2 to create a recommendation system that classifies data based on user prompts. Integrated LLaMa-2 API and Langchain Agent to automate SQL query generation and execution, facilitating efficient and accurate data validation. Initially used ChromaDB to store word embeddings but transitioned to a PostgreSQL instance for better scaling after deployment, with plans to extend the solution to streaming data using Apache Kafka.

full_output.name: Gaurav Gakhar
achievements_and_awards: Solved 300+ DSA problems on all coding platforms
Received Deans Excellence Award for Scoring Highest Cumulative Grade Point
